propDescriptions.children: The content of the component, normally an <img /> or a <div />. It should be only one element.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.columnSpan: The number of columns taken up by the component
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.height: The height of the component in px.
propDescriptions.sx: Allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
